description.english: Perform your first dimensional travel.
description.german: Travel across dimension for the first time.
description.french: Effectuer votre premier voyage dimensionnel.
description.russian: Осуществи первое путешествие между измерениями.
description.polish: Przenieś się do innego wymiaru po raz pierwszy.
description.brazilian: Faça sua primeira viagem dimensional.

description.english: Possess all the equipments and upgrades in Story mode.
description.german: Sammle im Story-Modus sämtliche Ausrüstung und Upgrades.
description.french: Posséder tous les équipments et toutes les améliorations en mode histoire.
description.russian: Собери все устройства и улучшения в режиме Истории.
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie przedmioty i ulepszenia w trybie fabuły.
description.brazilian: Obtenha todos os equipamentos e melhorias do modo Campanha.

description.english: Complete 42 arenas in Story mode.
description.german: Schließe im Story-Modus 42 Arenen ab.
description.french: Compléter 42 arènes en mode Histoire.
description.russian: Пройди 42 арены в режиме Истории.
description.polish: Ukończ 42 areny w trybie fabuły.
description.brazilian: Complete 42 arenas no modo Campanha.

description.english: Travel to the 7th dimension.
description.german: Reise in die siebte Dimension.
description.french: Accéder à la station 7.
description.russian: Отправься в 7-е измерение.
description.polish: Dotrzyj do 7. wymiaru.
description.brazilian: Viaje para a 7ª dimensão.

description.english: Obtain an A rank or better in all the Arcade rooms.
description.german: Erreiche in allen Arcade-Räumen mindestens den Rang A.
description.french: Obtenir un rang A ou mieux dans toutes les salles du mode Arcade.
description.russian: Получи ранг А во всех аркадных комнатах.
description.polish: Uzyskaj rangę A lub lepszą we wszystkich pokojach zręcznościowych.
description.brazilian: Obtenha uma posição A ou melhor em todas as salas Arcade.

description.english: Earn 500 credits in a bonus room.
description.german: Verdiene dir 500 Credits in einem Bonusraum.
description.french: Gagner 500 crédits dans une salle bonus.
description.russian: Заработай 500 кредитов в бонусной комнате.
description.polish: Zdobądź 500 kredytów w pokoju premii.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 500 créditos em uma sala bônus.

description.english: Discover all the bonus actions.
description.german: Entdecke alle Bonusaktionen.
description.french: Découvrir toutes les actions bonus.
description.russian: Открой все бонусные действия.
description.polish: Odkryj wszystkie manewry specjalne.
description.brazilian: Descubra todas as ações bônus.

description.english: Finish the Boss Rush mode.
description.german: Schließe den Bossansturm-Modus ab.
description.french: Arriver au bout du mode Boss Rush.
description.russian: Пройди режим Охоты на босса
description.polish: Ukończ grę w trybie "Szturm bossów".
description.brazilian: Conclua o modo Ataque ao Chefão.

description.english: Do a chain of 50 or more.
description.german: Schalte mindestens 50 Gegner hintereinander aus.
description.french: Réaliser une chaîne de 50 ou plus.
description.russian: Убей подряд 50 или больше врагов.
description.polish: Zabij przynajmniej 50 wrogów z rzędu.
description.brazilian: Destrua 50 inimigos em sequência ou mais.

description.english: You have encountered all the basic enemy types of the game.
description.german: Du bist sämtlichen Standardgegnern des Spiels begegnet.
description.french: Rencontrer tous les types d'ennemi de bases.
description.russian: Ты сразился со всеми типами врагов.
description.polish: Napotkano już wszystkie podstawowe rodzaje wrogów.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou todos os tipos de inimigos básicos do jogo.

description.english: Complete a world by finishing all the arenas in the Story mode.
description.german: Schließe eine Welt im Story-Modus ab, indem du alle Arenen erkundest.
description.french: Finir un monde en ayant accompli toutes les arènes.
description.russian: Изучи мир, пройдя все арены в режиме Истории.
description.polish: Ukończ cały świat (czyli wszystkie jego areny) w trybie fabuły.
description.brazilian: Conclua um mundo ao concluir todas as arenas no modo Campanha.

description.english: Achieve the story mode in Hardcore difficulty.
description.german: Schließe den Story-Modus auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Hardcore ab.
description.french: Finir le mode Histoire en mode de difficulté hardcore.
description.russian: Пройди режим Истории на уровне сложности Жесть.
description.polish: Ukończ tryb fabuły na najwyższym poziomie trudności.
description.brazilian: Conclua o modo Campanha na dificuldade Extremo.

description.english: Possess 2000 credits in Story mode.
description.german: Sammle im Story-Modus 2000 Credits.
description.french: Posséder au moins 2000 credits en mode histoire.
description.russian: Набери 2000 кредитов в режиме Истории.
description.polish: Zdobądź 2000 kredytów w trybie fabuły.
description.brazilian: Obtenha 2.000 créditos no modo Campanha.

description.english: Do at least 10 multikill bonus actions during an arena.
description.german: Führe mindestens 10 Mehrfachabschuss-Bonusaktionen in einer Arena aus.
description.french: Réaliser au moins 10 actions bonus tuerie dans une arène.
description.russian: Соверши 10 или более бонусных действий "Одним махом" на одной арене.
description.polish: Zalicz przynajmniej 10 manewrów specjalnych zabijających wielu wrogów na danej arenie.
description.brazilian: Faça pelo menos 10 ações bônus de múltiplas mortes em uma arena.

description.english: Do 8 different bonus actions in an arena.
description.german: Führe 8 verschiedene Bonusaktionen in einer Arena aus.
description.french: Réaliser au moins 8 actions bonus différentes dans une arène.
description.russian: Do 8 different bonus actions in an arena.
description.polish: Wykonaj 8 manewrów specjalnych na danej arenie.
description.brazilian: Faça pelo menos oito ações bônus diferentes em uma arena.

description.english: In Story mode, finish an arena with fully equipped B.O.B.
description.german: Schließe im Story-Modus eine Arena mit einem vollständig ausgerüsteten B.O.B. ab.
description.french: Finir une arène en ayant équipé entièrement B.O.B. en mode histoire.
description.russian: Пройди арену полностью экипированным B.O.B. в режиме Истории
description.polish: Dopilnuj, żeby po zakończeniu areny twój B.O.B. był w pełni wyposażony.
description.brazilian: No modo Campanha, conclua uma arena com B.O.B totalmente equipado.

description.english: Travel to the 6th dimension.
description.german: Reise in die sechste Dimension.
description.french: Accéder à la dimension 6.
description.russian: Отправься в 6-е измерение.
description.polish: Dotrzyj do 6. wymiaru.
description.brazilian: Viaje para a 6ª dimensão.

description.english: Obtain an S rank in any arena.
description.german: Erreiche in einer Arena den Rang S.
description.french: Obtenir un rang S dans n'importe quelle arène.
description.russian: Получи ранг S на любой арене.
description.polish: Zdobądź rangę S na jakiejkolwiek arenie.
description.brazilian: Obtenha uma posição S em qualquer arena.

description.english: Acquire 10 equipments and 10 upgrades in Story mode.
description.german: Sammle im Story-Modus 10 Ausrüstungsteile und 10 Upgrades.
description.french: Posséder 10 équipements et 10 améliorations en mode Histoire.
description.russian: Получи 10 устройств и 10 улучшений в режиме Истории.
description.polish: Zdobądź 10 przedmiotów i ulepszeń w trybie fabuły.
description.brazilian: Adquira 10 equipamentos e 10 melhorias no modo Campanha.

description.english: Achieve the Story mode in any difficulty setting.
description.german: Schließe den Story-Modus auf einem beliebigen Schwierigkeitsgrad ab.
description.french: Finir le mode Histoire dans n'importe quel niveau de difficulté.
description.russian: Пройди режим Истории на любом уровне сложности.
description.polish: Ukończ tryb fabuły na jakimkolwiek poziomie trudności.
description.brazilian: Complete o modo Campanha em qualquer grau de dificuldade.
